thread.section_title: Cruise Sale Finder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruise Sale Finder | www.cruisesalefinder.co.nz
thread.title: Lynnette White
thread.title_full: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Lynnette White

author: Lynnette White
title: Lynnette White
text:
I have booked cruises with cruise finder a few times and find them very helpful and professional . Always friendly to talk with. And grateful on their opinions on different cruise ships and locations whether or not they have experienced them personally.
Loaded with information which makes it easy to choose the right holiday .
